title: Genigma: Generative Puzzles
text: Welcome to this generative puzzle book! Created using the open-source programming language R, this book is completely free! And here’s the best part: it never runs out! If you’re craving more puzzles, just come back tomorrow. This book refreshes itself every day, generating 9 brand-new mandalas, 18 sudoku and 18 word finders for you to enjoy.
